name: Adjacency Wave Propagator
intent: Evolve semantic states over the adjacency network according to the adjacency wave equation.
algebraic\_properties: U\_Δ(t) preserves the semantic energy E\[r\] associated with Δ.
U\_Δ(t) can be expressed in the eigenbasis of Δ as decoupled harmonic oscillators.
constraints: U\_Δ must respect adjacency weights A and degree structure d(i).
U\_Δ must integrate with Π and ψ to define semantic collapse along adjacency pathways.
